main_definition: Damage refers to harm or negative impact caused to something, such as a property, object, reputation, or well-being.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physical harm or impairment resulting in loss of function
meanings_and_examples.example: The heavy rain caused damage to the roof of my house.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Financial loss or expenses due to an incident
meanings_and_examples.example: The car accident damaged both vehicles, leading to significant repair costs.
Being publicly criticized severely damaged her self-esteem.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Deterioration or spoilage of an object over time due to various factors
meanings_and_examples.example: Leaving a metal tool out in the rain will cause damage and lead to rust.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Negative effect on relationships, reputation, or social standing
meanings_and_examples.example: The false rumor damaged his reputation among colleagues.
